title: Journey Orchestration service Events: Dispatcher Fields
description: This event is in relation with journey and dispatcher service event fields

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Journey Orchestration dispatcher service event fields.
eventID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The Event ID to which this event was mapped inside the controller.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: projectionID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The projection id of the segment being used in journey

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: eventType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The type of dispatcher service event like error, discard

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: eventCode
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The error code indicating the reason for corresponding eventType
